subject: IME Request
body:
Hi,

We need to set up an IME asap. Client is Robert L. Hernandez.
Case number might be RH-99102 or something close to that.

Exam needed: Neurology.
Venue likely San Diego, CA.
We are hoping for sometime mid April.

Docs attached.

attachments.text_content: Medical records for Robert L. Hernandez. Patient is a 38-year-old male who sustained head trauma in a motor vehicle accident on February 3, 2025. Presented to ER with complaints of severe headaches, dizziness, and difficulty concentrating. CT scan performed showed no acute bleeding but mild concussion suspected. Neurology consult recommended. Patient has been experiencing ongoing symptoms including memory lapses, sensitivity to light, and intermittent nausea. Previous medical history unremarkable. Currently taking ibuprofen for pain management.

Additional documentation for Hernandez case. Follow-up visit on February 17, 2025 showed persistent post-concussive symptoms. Patient unable to return to work due to cognitive difficulties and ongoing headaches. Referred for neuropsychological testing. MRI ordered to rule out any structural abnormalities. Patient reports difficulty sleeping and mood changes since the accident. Family reports personality changes and increased irritability.
